urls.title: Cleaning Up with Michael Liebreich / Episode 31 - Emma Howard Boyd
urls.description: Emma Howard Boyd is one of the leading voices the UK‚Äôs Environment scene. As the Chair of the Environment Agency, she is at the forefront of the current environment agenda. This week, Michael and Emma will discuss everything from recent flooding in the UK to the unique UWC schooling experience.

tweets.text:
Having been in this meeting, it‚Äôs clear we need a path forward.

It‚Äôs time for @BarnetCouncil and @EnvAgency to step up and meet the challenges the Welsh Harp faces.

The volunteers are wonderful and working hard, but statutory bodies need to play their part too. https://t.co/gJG0cDds5m

@FoxesAfloat @CRTContactUs @CRTNorthWest We've got it on the Grand Union too guys at Bridge 75. @CRTContactUs and @EnvAgency contacted yesterday and still no one on site. These two swans are caked. I'm livid as I guess you are. https://t.co/hLA6Qkut4V

@TomWykes1 @ab4scambs @BBCCambs @EnvAgency My grandfather told me that his great grandfather was told by his great grandfather, who was born in Cottenham that by 2021 the fresh water springs would be dried up. See.
@carlgallery @ab4scambs @BBCCambs @EnvAgency Carl knows, he's old enough to remember.üòâ

Seahorse is delighted to be involved in such an important campaign. 

The @EnvAgency found that all rivers, lakes and streams in England are polluted. This is not good enough & we need big players to take responsibility for their role in this environmental degradation. https://t.co/Pcd4wFyjYq

Today marks the launch of @RiverActionUK's  first campaign. We are calling on major agricultural suppliers and producers to clean up their act and our rivers, starting with the River Wye.

Visit our website for more infoüëâ https://t.co/dH0DIfzTSP https://t.co/LrqpD5F22E

@MoorlandMonitor @stwater @EnvAgency @PeakChief @SheffieldGreens @ShefHallamLab @WarOnWildlife These are medieval practices happening in our @peakdistrict NP People visiting the @peakdistrict do not expect or support this destruction of wildlife. We need a #wilderfuture for our precious wildlife and for people.

If your business accepts #waste #tyres using a T8 exemption, note that we‚Äôre making random checks to ensure you‚Äôre complying with its conditions. If you have concerns about companies stockpiling waste tyres please contact our incident line 0800 807060 https://t.co/7bBw5Kcdj2

@FoxesAfloat @CRTContactUs @CRTNorthWest @EnvAgency I recommend we publish the CRT number and get our followers to give them a nudge. They do say that it's the squeaky wheel that gets the grease, so to speak...

@EnvAgencyYNE @Tod_Flood_Group https://t.co/KOHsVYKfJj

tweets.text:
Day four.
Still got diesel/oil emanating from Furness Vale Marina on the Peak Forest Canal. The boat is covered in it, dozens of geese and ducks are in the contaminated water, and it stinks like a refinery. Any chance of some action SOON please? @CRTContactUs @CRTNorthWest https://t.co/TxtPwEhlwp

Looking forward to an interesting disucussion over the next 90 minutes on the #MarineSuperYear with colleagues from across #ocean science - @DefraGovUK, @OceanCTrust, @PlymouthMarine, @FCGulbenkian, @WWFUK, @EnvAgency and more!
#WeareOcean
#TeamMarSocSci
#marsocsci https://t.co/U02AGnDXxW
